title: Oy-Mittelberg
text:
Oy-Mittelberg is a <a href="Municipalities%20of%20Germany">municipality</a> in the rural district <a href="Oberallg%C3%A4u">Oberallgäu</a> in <a href="Bavaria">Bavaria</a>/<a href="Germany">Germany</a>.
Geography.
Oy-Mittelberg is situated in the <a href="Allg%C3%A4u">Allgäu</a> region in the foothills of the <a href="Allg%C3%A4u%20Alps">Allgäu Alps</a>. The municipality consists of the villages of Burgkranzegg, Faistenoy, Haslach, Kressen, Maria-Rain, Mittelberg, Oberschwarzenberg, Oberzollhaus, Oy, Petersthal and Riedis. In addition to that there are several small hamlets.
